chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the following issue:

Good morning, I paid for the article and received an email saying that my payment was rejected, and then another one saying it was accepted. Could you please tell me if my payment was actually accepted by your system? Thank you very much.

Thank you for the help,

Dear Backcare,

Could you kindly inform the customer that we have successfully confirmed the payment and that the phone is now on its way to them?

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

We have already informed the customer of this.

Kind regards,

Victor from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for informing the customer. Once the customer acknowledges, kindly close this case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
